Welcome

This is the personal website of Sven Franke, showcasing research, projects, and academic work.

About Me

I am a research associate and PhD student specializing in material handling, warehousing, and mobile robotics.

Education

  • Master of Science (M.Sc.) - Industrial Engineering, TU Dortmund University, 2020-2021
  • Bachelor of Science (B.Sc.) - Industrial Engineering, TU Dortmund University, 2014-2020

Professional Experience

Research Associate - Chair of Material Handling and Warehousing, TU Dortmund University
April 2022 - Present

  • Research in material handling systems and warehouse automation
  • Mobile robotics and AGV standardization (VDA 5050, M2X)

Student Assistant - Fraunhofer Institute for Material Flow and Logistics IML, Department of Intralogistics and IT Planning
December 2019 - March 2022

  • Supported research projects in intralogistics planning

Intern - HELLA (now FORVIA HELLA), SMD Production
September 2019 - November 2019

  • Gained experience in surface-mount device manufacturing

Student Assistant - Fraunhofer Institute for Material Flow and Logistics IML, Department of Intralogistics and IT Planning
March 2018 - August 2019

  • Early research experience in warehouse and logistics systems

Awards & Recognition

  • Best Speaker Award (2nd Place) - Mobile Robotics Summit 2025
    For presentation on “M2X Further standardization in the field of AGVs alongside VDA 5050”

  • Deutschlandstipendium (German Scholarship) - TU Dortmund University, 2020/2021
    Funded by LANXESS AG
